name: while(true) (PizzArt)
description:
Description

Try to break; the while(true) loop in this small, but quite fun puzzle game! The tiles are your best friends here. Use your friends to your advantage in order to complete the levels and finish the game! And with an built-in level editor, the possibilities are endless! Build and share your own levels to challenge your real friends with!

And remember: Think i+1 steps ahead.

Made for Ludum Dare 47
